name: Cat & Dog Running Adventure
description:
Dog and cat had a clash in this dog and cat game both wants to have more Santa clause gifts so they had heated arguments resulted in a clash “you are skinny and bones” said the talking dog in a gruffy tone. “You are too fat and dense” said the talking cat which makes the pet dog very upset and the war is on. Cat talking ran to escape from angry dog while dog run to chase cat as soon as she hide at safe place.
Cat vs Dog Clash of War is best dog games where you have to help the cat to escape & dodge angry dog as much as possible as dog is very angry at cat in this simulator game since smart cat teased the dog & run for life which really make the dog very upset so dog wants to take revenge in this war of cat & dog game.

In this clash of cat & dog you are playing as cat to rescue cat on her way to help her destine at safe place in this run & travel adventure of cat. You must help pet kitty in crossing all hurdles like rocks, rolling rocks, fire, razors and many more in this kitty game. Your pet cat must jump, roll and run in order to cross all obstacles in a timely manner in this running game of cat & dog.

This Cat & Dog Running Adventure got two modes, one mode is level mode with less obstacles in starting levels and more as soon as you proceed and other is endless mode with lesser difficulties at start and more as soon as you move forward in order to make it more addicting game & challenging game and of the new year 2016.

---Game Features---:
*** Play multiple exciting levels of this mini games.
*** Adorable pets used in this game.
*** Colorful and intense HD graphics,
*** Both cat & dogs characters are acrobatics
*** Most daring chase of dog.
*** Special powers for each 3D model used in this game.
*** Smooth controls.
